first_para: Stephen McPartland (born 9 August 1976) is a British Conservative Party politician who was elected as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Stevenage at the 2010 general election.

full.extract:
Stephen McPartland (born 9 August 1976) is a British Conservative Party politician who was elected as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Stevenage at the 2010 general election.
^ "MP Biographies". UK Parliament Website. Retrieved 15 January 2012.
full.title: Stephen McPartland
